name: owlistic
description: Owlistic is a self-hosted note and knowledge management app designed for hierarchical organization. It features Markdown support, linked notes, and a responsive web interface for personal documentation.
features: Hierarchical Notes: Organize knowledge in tree-like structures with nested folders and sub-categories for logical organization.
Markdown Support: Write and format notes using Markdown syntax with live preview and syntax highlighting.
Linked Notes: Create connections between notes with bidirectional linking and relationship visualization.
Search Engine: Full-text search across all notes with advanced filtering and tag-based discovery.
Knowledge Graph: Visualize note relationships and connections with interactive graph views and navigation.
Version History: Track changes to notes with version control and easy rollback to previous versions.
Tag System: Organize content with flexible tagging system and tag-based filtering and categorization.
Export Options: Export notes and knowledge bases to various formats including PDF, HTML, and Markdown.
Responsive Design: Access and edit notes seamlessly across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
Privacy Focused: Self-hosted solution ensuring complete control over personal knowledge and sensitive information.
Collaboration Tools: Share knowledge bases with team members and control access permissions for different users.
Backup Integration: Automated backup systems with export capabilities for data protection and migration.
